entry.title: 个人博客网站搭建
entry.content:
必要环境安装

git

一般问题不大

npm

npm (Node Package Manager)是一个用于 JavaScript和 Node.js的包管理器。它不仅是 Node.js的默认包管理器，还提供了发布和共享代码、管理依赖、版本控制等功能。npm允许开发者从全球的代码库中获取并安装 Node.js模块，这些模块可以用于构建应用程序、工具和包等。
简单来说，npm就像一个巨大的软件仓库，里面存放了各种 JavaScript和 Node.js的模块（也叫包）。

ChatGPT建议使用nvm安装Node.js + npm（更干净灵活）。

Node.js

不想让系统包干扰，可以用 nvm（Node Version Manager）来安装 Node.js + npm：

如果报以下错误：

说明当前系统的 GLIBC版本太低，而你安装的 Node.js二进制文件依赖于更高版本的 GLIBC（2.28）。

🧠 原因分析
Ubuntu 18.04 的默认 glibc 是 2.27。
Node.js 官方预构建二进制从某个版本开始依赖 glibc >= 2.28（通常从 Node.js 18 或更高版本开始）。
所以如果在 Ubuntu 18.04 或老系统上安装了较新的 Node.js，就会出这个错。

  1. 彻底删除旧版本 Node.js，以防系统中残留了之前的 node安装路径或链接。
    执行以下命令清理旧的 node/npm：

  2. 安装 nvm（Node Version Manager）

  3. 使用 nvm安装 Node.js 16

  4. 验证：

🚀 总结

使用 nvm 方式安装 Node.js是：

  • ✅ 最兼容的
  • ✅ 不依赖系统 glibc
  • ✅ 不需要 root 权限
  • ✅ 可随时切换 Node.js 版本
nvm使用

  • 查看已安装的 Node.js版本

  • 版本切换

  • 设置默认版本（打开终端自动使用）

  • 如果没有安装目标版本

基于Hexo框架搭建

Hexo项目中，源代码（markdown、主题等） 和生成后的网页是分开的

  • 一个仓库存放 Hexo源码（如 hexo-iNog-blog）<font color=gree>（可选）</font>
  • 一个仓库存放部署页面（如 i-nog.github.io）

  • 下载 Hexo

    • 安装 hexo插件

  • 创建框架

    hexo的文件结构：

    • public最终所见网页的所有内容
    • node_modules插件以及 hexo所需 node.js模块
    • _config.yml站点配置文件，设定一些公开信息等
    • package.json应用程序信息，配置 hexo运行所需 js包
    • scaffolds模板文件夹，新建文章，会默认包含对应模板内容
    • themes存放主题文件，hexo根据主题生成静态网页（速度贼快）
    • source用于存放用户资源（除 posts文件夹，其余命名方式为 “ + 文件名”的文件被忽略）

    注意：hexo-iNog-blog/文件夹无需配置git仓库，除非个人想进行版本管理，方便长期开发。

  • 下载自己喜欢的主题
    在Themes查找自己喜欢的主题，比如Keep主题

  • 配置主题
    在 Hexo配置文件 _config.yml中将 theme设置为 keep。

  • 自定义主题内容
    需要修改 themes/keep/_config.yml文件

  • 本地预览

创建及配置Gitbub Pages

  1. <font color=red>创建同用户名仓库</font>，且是公共(Public)仓库

    GitHub Pages只支持公共仓库免费部署。如果仓库是私有的：

    • 地址不会生成；
    • 或者会提示升级为付费账户。

  2. 设置仓库 Pages信息

  3. 本地关联 github，需配置 _config.yml文件中将 deploy
    <font color=gree>注意，是用户名.github.io那个仓库 。</font>

    同时还需要配置 git参数，如下：

    注意：是要配置全局的name和email。

  4. 上传

    deploy过程会生成.deploy_git/文件夹（内容同public/目录），自动关联到用户名.github.io仓库，将文件夹的内容推送到该仓库。

  5. ❌ 不推荐直接把 Hexo项目源码上传到 .github.io仓库
    因为 GitHub Pages无法直接解析 source/里的 .md文件，它只支持静态 HTML页面。

与JopLin笔记本配合（无很好适配）

Joplin Publisher插件教程

  • 配置仓库的读写权限



    结果：

参考文献

Ubuntu20.04 +GitHub+Hexo 0基础0成本免费配置个人博客

快速搭建个人博客 —— 保姆级教程
entry.summary: 必要环境安装

entry.title: Apollo r5.5.0 代码解读之规划模块--多项次曲线
entry.content:
多项次曲线

Apollo r5.5.0代码分析。

简介

点到点的轨迹规划算法可以理解为在规划的时间TTT内，从已知起始点 θstart\theta_{start}θstart​运动到末尾点θend\theta_{end}θend​的方法。这里引入中间变量s(t)s(t)s(t)，它是时间的函数，定义域[0,T][0,T][0,T]，值域[0,1][0,1][0,1]，sss与θ\thetaθ的关系见下面公式。这个公式不难理解，当s=0s=0s=0时，θ=θstart\theta=\theta_{start}θ=θstart​；当s=1s=1s=1时，θ=θend\theta=\theta_{end}θ=θend​。

θ(s)=θstart+s(θend−θstart),s∈[0,1]s=s(t),t∈[0,T]\begin{aligned}\theta(s)&=\theta_{start}+s(\theta_{end}-\theta_{start}),s\in[0,1] \\s&=s(t),t\in[0,T] \\\end{aligned}θ(s)s​=θstart​+s(θend​−θstart​),s∈[0,1]=s(t),t∈[0,T]​

θ\thetaθ对ttt求导是速度，即：

∂θ∂t=∂θ∂s⋅∂s∂t其中∂θ∂s=θend−θstart∂θ∂t=(θend−θstart)⋅∂s∂t\begin{aligned}\frac{\partial\theta}{\partial t}&= \frac{\partial\theta}{\partial s} \cdot \frac{\partial s}{\partial t} \quad其中\frac{\partial\theta}{\partial s}=\theta_{end} -\theta_{start} \\\frac{\partial\theta}{\partial t}&=(\theta_{end} -\theta_{start})\cdot \frac{\partial s}{\partial t} \\\end{aligned}∂t∂θ​∂t∂θ​​=∂s∂θ​⋅∂t∂s​其中∂s∂θ​=θend​−θstart​=(θend​−θstart​)⋅∂t∂s​​

θ\thetaθ对ttt求二阶导是加速度，即

∂2θ∂t2=∂(∂θ∂s)∂t⋅∂s∂t+∂θ∂s⋅∂2s∂t2其中∂(∂θ∂s)∂t=∂(θend−θstart)∂t=0∂2θ∂t2=(θend−θstart)⋅∂2s∂t2\begin{aligned}\frac{\partial^2\theta}{\partial t^2}&= \frac{\partial(\frac{\partial\theta}{\partial s})}{\partial t} \cdot \frac{\partial s}{\partial t}+\frac{\partial\theta}{\partial s} \cdot \frac{\partial^2 s}{\partial t^2} \quad其中\frac{\partial(\frac{\partial\theta}{\partial s})}{\partial t}=\frac{\partial(\theta_{end} -\theta_{start})}{\partial t}=0 \\\frac{\partial^2\theta}{\partial t^2}&=(\theta_{end} -\theta_{start})\cdot \frac{\partial^2 s}{\partial t^2} \\\end{aligned}∂t2∂2θ​∂t2∂2θ​​=∂t∂(∂s∂θ​)​⋅∂t∂s​+∂s∂θ​⋅∂t2∂2s​其中∂t∂(∂s∂θ​)​=∂t∂(θend​−θstart​)​=0=(θend​−θstart​)⋅∂t2∂2s​​

由于θstart\theta_{start}θstart​和θend\theta_{end}θend​是已知的，所以速度和加速度随时间的变化取决与s=s(t),t∈[0,T]s=s(t),t\in[0,T]s=s(t),t∈[0,T]。

这里的s(t)s(t)s(t)有很多种方法，比较常见的是三次函数，五次函数，梯形函数，S曲线等。

三次曲线–>cubic polynomial curve1d

s(t)=a0+a1t+a2t2+a3t3\begin{aligned}s(t)=a_0 + a_1t + a_2t^2 + a_3t^3\end{aligned}s(t)=a0​+a1​t+a2​t2+a3​t3​

入参初始条件

s(0)=a0=x0  ⟺  a0=x0s′(0)=a1=dx0  ⟺  a1=dx0s′′(0)=2a2=ddx0  ⟺  a2=ddx02s(T)=a0+a1T+a2T2+a3T3=x1  ⟺  a3=x1−x0−dx0T−ddx02T2T3\begin{aligned}s(0) = a_0 = x_0 \iff a_0 = x_0 \\ s'(0) = a_1 = dx_0 \iff a_1 = dx_0 \\s''(0) = 2a_2 = ddx_0 \iff a_2 = \frac{ddx_0}{2} \\s(T) = a_0 + a_1T + a_2T^2 + a_3T^3 = x_1 \iff a_3 = \frac{x_1 - x_0 - dx_0T - \frac{ddx_0}{2}T^2}{T^3}\end{aligned}s(0)=a0​=x0​⟺a0​=x0​s′(0)=a1​=dx0​⟺a1​=dx0​s′′(0)=2a2​=ddx0​⟺a2​=2ddx0​​s(T)=a0​+a1​T+a2​T2+a3​T3=x1​⟺a3​=T3x1​−x0​−dx0​T−2ddx0​​T2​​

<font color=green>CubicPolynomialCurve1d::Evaluate()</font>是计算几阶导数的值。

四次曲线–>quartic polynomial curve1d

s(t)=a0+a1t+a2t2+a3t3+a4t4\begin{aligned}s(t)=a_0 + a_1t + a_2t^2 + a_3t^3 + a_4t^4\end{aligned}s(t)=a0​+a1​t+a2​t2+a3​t3+a4​t4​

入参初始条件（一）: x0, dx0, ddx0, dx1, ddx1

s(0)=a0=x0  ⟺  a0=x0s′(0)=a1=dx0  ⟺  a1=dx0s′′(0)=2a2=ddx0  ⟺  a2=ddx02\begin{aligned}s(0) = a_0 = x_0 \iff a_0 = x_0 \\ s'(0) = a_1 = dx_0 \iff a_1 = dx_0 \\s''(0) = 2a_2 = ddx_0 \iff a_2 = \frac{ddx_0}{2} \\\end{aligned}s(0)=a0​=x0​⟺a0​=x0​s′(0)=a1​=dx0​⟺a1​=dx0​s′′(0)=2a2​=ddx0​⟺a2​=2ddx0​​​

s′(T)=a1+2a2T+3a3T2+4a4T3=dx1(1)s'(T) = a_1 + 2a_2T + 3a_3T^2 + 4a_4T^3 = dx_1 \tag 1s′(T)=a1​+2a2​T+3a3​T2+4a4​T3=dx1​(1)

s′′(T)=2a2+6a3T+12a4T2=ddx1(2)s''(T) = 2a_2 + 6a_3T + 12a_4T^2 = ddx_1 \tag2s′′(T)=2a2​+6a3​T+12a4​T2=ddx1​(2)

公式3*(1)-T*(2)得：

3a1+6a2T+9a3T2+12a4T3=3dx12a2T+6a3T2+12a4T3=T∗ddx1  ⟺  3a1+4a2T+3a3T2=3dx1−T∗ddx1  ⟺  a3=3dx1−T∗ddx1−3a1−4a2T3T2  ⟺  a3=3dx1−T∗ddx1−3dx0−2ddx0T3T2  ⟺  a3=3(dx1−ddx0T−dx0)−T∗(ddx1−ddx0)3T2\begin{aligned}3a_1 + 6a_2T + 9a_3T^2 +12a_4T^3 & = 3dx_1 \\2a_2T + 6a_3T^2 + 12a_4T^3& = T*ddx_1 \\\iff 3a_1 + 4a_2T +3a_3T^2 &= 3dx_1 - T*ddx_1 \\\iff a_3 & = \frac{3dx_1 - T*ddx_1-3a_1-4a_2T}{3T^2} \\\iff a_3 & = \frac{3dx_1 - T*ddx_1-3dx_0 -2ddx_0T}{3T^2} \\\iff a_3 & = \frac{3(dx_1 - ddx_0T - dx_0) - T*(ddx_1 - ddx_0)}{3T^2} \end{aligned}3a1​+6a2​T+9a3​T2+12a4​T32a2​T+6a3​T2+12a4​T3⟺3a1​+4a2​T+3a3​T2⟺a3​⟺a3​⟺a3​​=3dx1​=T∗ddx1​=3dx1​−T∗ddx1​=3T23dx1​−T∗ddx1​−3a1​−4a2​T​=3T23dx1​−T∗ddx1​−3dx0​−2ddx0​T​=3T23(dx1​−ddx0​T−dx0​)−T∗(ddx1​−ddx0​)​​

公式2(1)-T(2)得：

2a1+4a2T+6a3T2+8a4T3=2dx12a2T+6a3T2+12a4T3=T∗ddx1  ⟺  2a1+2a2T−4a4T3=2dx1−T∗ddx1  ⟺  a4=2a1+2a2T−2dx1+T∗ddx14T3  ⟺  a4=2dx0+ddx0T−2dx1+T∗ddx14T3  ⟺  a4=−2(dx1−ddx0T−dx0)+T∗(ddx1−ddx0)4T3\begin{aligned}2a_1 + 4a_2T + 6a_3T^2 +8a_4T^3 & = 2dx_1 \\2a_2T + 6a_3T^2 + 12a_4T^3& = T*ddx_1 \\\iff 2a_1 + 2a_2T - 4a_4T^3 &= 2dx_1 - T*ddx_1 \\\iff a_4 & = \frac{2a_1 + 2a_2T - 2dx_1 + T*ddx_1}{4T^3} \\\iff a_4 & = \frac{2dx_0 + ddx_0T - 2dx_1 + T*ddx_1}{4T^3} \\\iff a_4 & = \frac{-2(dx_1 - ddx_0T - dx_0) + T*(ddx_1 - ddx_0)}{4T^3} \end{aligned}2a1​+4a2​T+6a3​T2+8a4​T32a2​T+6a3​T2+12a4​T3⟺2a1​+2a2​T−4a4​T3⟺a4​⟺a4​⟺a4​​=2dx1​=T∗ddx1​=2dx1​−T∗ddx1​=4T32a1​+2a2​T−2dx1​+T∗ddx1​​=4T32dx0​+ddx0​T−2dx1​+T∗ddx1​​=4T3−2(dx1​−ddx0​T−dx0​)+T∗(ddx1​−ddx0​)​​

入参初始条件（二）: x0, dx0, ddx0, x1, dx1

s(0)=a0=x0  ⟺  a0=x0s′(0)=a1=dx0  ⟺  a1=dx0s′′(0)=2a2=ddx0  ⟺  a2=ddx02\begin{aligned}s(0) = a_0 = x_0 \iff a_0 = x_0 \\ s'(0) = a_1 = dx_0 \iff a_1 = dx_0 \\s''(0) = 2a_2 = ddx_0 \iff a_2 = \frac{ddx_0}{2} \\\end{aligned}s(0)=a0​=x0​⟺a0​=x0​s′(0)=a1​=dx0​⟺a1​=dx0​s′′(0)=2a2​=ddx0​⟺a2​=2ddx0​​​

s(T)=a0+a1T+a2T2+a3T3+a4T4=x1(3)s(T)=a_0 + a_1T + a_2T^2 + a_3T^3 + a_4T^4 = x_1 \tag 3s(T)=a0​+a1​T+a2​T2+a3​T3+a4​T4=x1​(3)

s′(T)=a1+2a2T+3a3T2+4a4T3=dx1(4)s'(T) =a_1 + 2a_2T + 3a_3T^2 + 4a_4T^3 = dx_1 \tag 4s′(T)=a1​+2a2​T+3a3​T2+4a4​T3=dx1​(4)

公式4*(3)-T(4)得：

4a0+4a1T+4a2T2+4a3T3+4a4T4=4x1a1T+2a2T2+3a3T3+4a4T4=T∗dx1  ⟺  4a0+3a1T+2a2T2+a3T3=4x1−T∗dx1  ⟺  a3=4x1−T∗dx1−4a0−3a1T−2a2T2T3  ⟺  a3=4x1−T∗dx1−4x0−3dx0T−ddx0T2T3  ⟺  a3=4(x1−x0−dx0T−ddx02T2)−T∗(dx1−dx0−ddx0T)T3\begin{aligned}4a_0 + 4a_1T + 4a_2T^2 + 4a_3T^3 + 4a_4T^4& = 4x_1 \\a_1T + 2a_2T^2 + 3a_3T^3 + 4a_4T^4& = T*dx_1 \\\iff 4a_0 + 3a_1T + 2a_2T^2 + a_3T^3 &= 4x_1 - T*dx_1 \\\iff a_3 & = \frac{4x_1 - T*dx_1-4a_0-3a_1T-2a_2T^2}{T^3} \\\iff a_3 & = \frac{4x_1 - T*dx_1 - 4x_0 - 3dx_0T-ddx_0T^2}{T^3} \\\iff a_3 & = \frac{4(x_1-x_0-dx_0T-\frac{ddx_0}{2}T^2) - T*(dx_1-dx_0 - ddx_0T)}{T^3} \end{aligned}4a0​+4a1​T+4a2​T2+4a3​T3+4a4​T4a1​T+2a2​T2+3a3​T3+4a4​T4⟺4a0​+3a1​T+2a2​T2+a3​T3⟺a3​⟺a3​⟺a3​​=4x1​=T∗dx1​=4x1​−T∗dx1​=T34x1​−T∗dx1​−4a0​−3a1​T−2a2​T2​=T34x1​−T∗dx1​−4x0​−3dx0​T−ddx0​T2​=T34(x1​−x0​−dx0​T−2ddx0​​T2)−T∗(dx1​−dx0​−ddx0​T)​​

公式3*(3)-T(3)得：

3a0+3a1T+3a2T2+3a3T3+3a4T4=3x1a1T+2a2T2+3a3T3+4a4T4=T∗dx1  ⟺  3a0+2a1T+a2T2−a4T4=3x1−T∗dx1  ⟺  a4=3a0+2a1T+a2T2−3x1+T∗dx1T4  ⟺  a4=3x0+2dx0T+ddx02T2−3x1+T∗dx1T4  ⟺  a4=T∗(dx1−dx0−ddx0T)−3(x1−x0−dx0T−ddx02T2)T4\begin{aligned}3a_0 + 3a_1T + 3a_2T^2 + 3a_3T^3 + 3a_4T^4& = 3x_1 \\a_1T + 2a_2T^2 + 3a_3T^3 + 4a_4T^4& = T*dx_1 \\\iff 3a_0 + 2a_1T + a_2T^2 - a_4T^4 &= 3x_1 - T*dx_1 \\\iff a_4 & = \frac{3a_0 + 2a_1T + a_2T^2 - 3x_1 + T*dx_1}{T^4} \\\iff a_4 & = \frac{3x_0 + 2dx_0T + \frac{ddx_0}{2}T^2 - 3x_1 + T*dx_1}{T^4} \\\iff a_4 & = \frac{T*(dx_1 - dx_0 - ddx_0T) - 3(x_1-x_0-dx_0T - \frac{ddx_0}{2}T^2)}{T^4} \end{aligned}3a0​+3a1​T+3a2​T2+3a3​T3+3a4​T4a1​T+2a2​T2+3a3​T3+4a4​T4⟺3a0​+2a1​T+a2​T2−a4​T4⟺a4​⟺a4​⟺a4​​=3x1​=T∗dx1​=3x1​−T∗dx1​=T43a0​+2a1​T+a2​T2−3x1​+T∗dx1​​=T43x0​+2dx0​T+2ddx0​​T2−3x1​+T∗dx1​​=T4T∗(dx1​−dx0​−ddx0​T)−3(x1​−x0​−dx0​T−2ddx0​​T2)​​

入参初始条件（三）: x0, dx0, x1, dx1, ddx1

s(0)=a0=x0  ⟺  a0=x0s′(0)=a1=dx0  ⟺  a1=dx0\begin{aligned}s(0) = a_0 = x_0 \iff a_0 = x_0 \\ s'(0) = a_1 = dx_0 \iff a_1 = dx_0 \\\end{aligned}s(0)=a0​=x0​⟺a0​=x0​s′(0)=a1​=dx0​⟺a1​=dx0​​

s(T)=a0+a1T+a2T2+a3T3+a4T4=x1(5)s(T)=a_0 + a_1T + a_2T^2 + a_3T^3 + a_4T^4 = x_1 \tag 5s(T)=a0​+a1​T+a2​T2+a3​T3+a4​T4=x1​(5)

s′(T)=a1+2a2T+3a3T2+4a4T3=dx1(6)s'(T)=a_1 + 2a_2T + 3a_3T^2 + 4a_4T^3 = dx_1 \tag 6s′(T)=a1​+2a2​T+3a3​T2+4a4​T3=dx1​(6)

s′′(T)=2a2+6a3T+12a4T2=ddx1(7)s''(T)=2a_2 + 6a_3T + 12a_4T^2 = ddx_1 \tag 7s′′(T)=2a2​+6a3​T+12a4​T2=ddx1​(7)

公式12*(5)-6*T*(6)+T*T*(7)得：

12a0+12a1T+12a2T2+12a3T3+12a4T4=12x16a1T+12a2T2+18a3T3+24a4T4=6dx1T2a2T2+6a3T3+12a4T4=ddx1T2  ⟺  12a0+6a1T+2a2T2=12x1−6dx1T+ddx1T2  ⟺  a2=12x1−6dx1T+ddx1T2−12a0−6a1T2T2  ⟺  a2=12x1−6dx1T+ddx1T2−12x0−6dx0T2T2  ⟺  a2=0.5ddx1T2−3(dx1−dx0)T+6(x1−x0−dx0T)T2\begin{aligned}12a_0 + 12a_1T + 12a_2T^2 + 12a_3T^3 + 12a_4T^4 & = 12x_1 \\6a_1T + 12a_2T^2 + 18a_3T^3 + 24a_4T^4 & = 6dx_1T \\2a_2T^2 + 6a_3T^3 + 12a_4T^4 & = ddx_1T^2 \\\iff 12a_0 + 6a_1T + 2a_2T^2 & = 12x_1 - 6dx_1T + ddx_1T^2 \\\iff a_2 & = \frac{12x_1 - 6dx_1T + ddx_1T^2 - 12a_0 -6a_1T}{2T^2} \\\iff a_2 & = \frac{12x_1 - 6dx_1T + ddx_1T^2 - 12x_0 -6dx_0T}{2T^2} \\\iff a_2 & = \frac{0.5ddx_1T^2 - 3(dx_1-dx_0)T + 6(x_1-x_0-dx_0T)}{T^2} \\\end{aligned}12a0​+12a1​T+12a2​T2+12a3​T3+12a4​T46a1​T+12a2​T2+18a3​T3+24a4​T42a2​T2+6a3​T3+12a4​T4⟺12a0​+6a1​T+2a2​T2⟺a2​⟺a2​⟺a2​​=12x1​=6dx1​T=ddx1​T2=12x1​−6dx1​T+ddx1​T2=2T212x1​−6dx1​T+ddx1​T2−12a0​−6a1​T​=2T212x1​−6dx1​T+ddx1​T2−12x0​−6dx0​T​=T20.5ddx1​T2−3(dx1​−dx0​)T+6(x1​−x0​−dx0​T)​​

公式8*(5)-5*T*(6)+T*T*(7)得：

8a0+8a1T+8a2T2+8a3T3+8a4T4=8x15a1T+10a2T2+15a3T3+20a4T4=5dx1T2a2T2+6a3T3+12a4T4=ddx1T2  ⟺  8a0+3a1T−a3T3=8x1−5dx1T+ddx1T2  ⟺  a3=8a0+3a1T−8x1+5dx1T−ddx1T2T3  ⟺  a3=8x0+3dx0T−8x1+5dx1T−ddx1T2T3  ⟺  a3=−ddx1T2+5(dx1−dx0)T−8(x1−x0−dx0T)T3\begin{aligned}8a_0 + 8a_1T + 8a_2T^2 + 8a_3T^3 + 8a_4T^4 & = 8x_1 \\5a_1T + 10a_2T^2 + 15a_3T^3 + 20a_4T^4 & = 5dx_1T \\2a_2T^2 + 6a_3T^3 + 12a_4T^4 & = ddx_1T^2 \\\iff 8a_0 + 3a_1T - a_3T^3 & = 8x_1 - 5dx_1T + ddx_1T^2 \\\iff a_3 & = \frac{8a_0 + 3a_1T - 8x_1 + 5dx_1T - ddx_1T^2}{T^3} \\\iff a_3 & = \frac{8x_0 + 3dx_0T - 8x_1 + 5dx_1T - ddx_1T^2}{T^3} \\\iff a_3 & = \frac{-ddx_1T^2 + 5(dx_1-dx_0)T - 8(x_1-x_0-dx_0T)}{T^3} \\\end{aligned}8a0​+8a1​T+8a2​T2+8a3​T3+8a4​T45a1​T+10a2​T2+15a3​T3+20a4​T42a2​T2+6a3​T3+12a4​T4⟺8a0​+3a1​T−a3​T3⟺a3​⟺a3​⟺a3​​=8x1​=5dx1​T=ddx1​T2=8x1​−5dx1​T+ddx1​T2=T38a0​+3a1​T−8x1​+5dx1​T−ddx1​T2​=T38x0​+3dx0​T−8x1​+5dx1​T−ddx1​T2​=T3−ddx1​T2+5(dx1​−dx0​)T−8(x1​−x0​−dx0​T)​​

公式6*(5)-4*T*(6)+T*T*(7)得：

6a0+6a1T+6a2T2+6a3T3+6a4T4=6x14a1T+8a2T2+12a3T3+16a4T4=4dx1T2a2T2+6a3T3+12a4T4=ddx1T2  ⟺  6a0+2a1T+2a4T4=6x1−4dx1T+ddx1T2  ⟺  a3=3x1−2dx1T+0.5ddx1T2−3a0−a1TT4  ⟺  a3=3x1−2dx1T+0.5ddx1T2−3x0−dx0TT4  ⟺  a3=0.5ddx1T2−2(dx1−dx0)T+3(x1−x0−dx0T)T4\begin{aligned}6a_0 + 6a_1T + 6a_2T^2 + 6a_3T^3 + 6a_4T^4 & = 6x_1 \\4a_1T + 8a_2T^2 + 12a_3T^3 + 16a_4T^4 & = 4dx_1T \\2a_2T^2 + 6a_3T^3 + 12a_4T^4 & = ddx_1T^2 \\\iff 6a_0 + 2a_1T + 2a_4T^4 & = 6x_1 - 4dx_1T + ddx_1T^2 \\\iff a_3 & = \frac{3x_1 - 2dx_1T + 0.5ddx_1T^2-3a_0 -a_1T}{T^4} \\\iff a_3 & = \frac{3x_1 - 2dx_1T + 0.5ddx_1T^2-3x_0 -dx_0T}{T^4} \\\iff a_3 & = \frac{0.5ddx_1T^2 - 2(dx_1-dx_0)T + 3(x_1-x_0-dx_0T)}{T^4} \\\end{aligned}6a0​+6a1​T+6a2​T2+6a3​T3+6a4​T44a1​T+8a2​T2+12a3​T3+16a4​T42a2​T2+6a3​T3+12a4​T4⟺6a0​+2a1​T+2a4​T4⟺a3​⟺a3​⟺a3​​=6x1​=4dx1​T=ddx1​T2=6x1​−4dx1​T+ddx1​T2=T43x1​−2dx1​T+0.5ddx1​T2−3a0​−a1​T​=T43x1​−2dx1​T+0.5ddx1​T2−3x0​−dx0​T​=T40.5ddx1​T2−2(dx1​−dx0​)T+3(x1​−x0​−dx0​T)​​

<font color=green>CubicPolynomialCurve1d::Evaluate()</font>是计算几阶导数的值。

五次曲线–>quintic polynomial curve1d

s(t)=a0+a1t+a2t2+a3t3+a4t4+a5t5s(t)=a_0 + a_1t + a_2t^2 + a_3t^3 + a_4t^4 + a_5t^5s(t)=a0​+a1​t+a2​t2+a3​t3+a4​t4+a5​t5

{a0=x0a1=dx0a2=ddx02a3=0.5∗(20x1−0.5ddx0T2−dx0T−x0T3−8dx1−ddx0T−dx0T2+ddx1−ddx0T)a4=−15x1−0.5ddx0T2−dx0T−x0T3+7dx1−ddx0T−dx0T2−ddx1−ddx0TTa5=6x1−0.5ddx0T2−dx0T−x0T3−3dx1−ddx0T−dx0T2+0.5ddx1−ddx0TT2\begin{cases}{}a_0 = x_0 \\ a_1 = dx_0 \\a_2 = \frac{ddx_0}{2} \\a_3 = 0.5*(20\frac{x_1-0.5ddx_0T^2-dx_0T-x_0}{T^3} -8\frac{dx_1-ddx_0T-dx_0}{T^2} + \frac{ddx_1-ddx_0}{T}) \\a_4 =\frac{-15\frac{x_1-0.5ddx_0T^2-dx_0T-x_0}{T^3} + 7\frac{dx_1-ddx_0T-dx_0}{T^2} - \frac{ddx_1-ddx_0}{T}}{T} \\a_5 =\frac{6\frac{x_1-0.5ddx_0T^2-dx_0T-x_0}{T^3} - 3\frac{dx_1-ddx_0T-dx_0}{T^2} + 0.5\frac{ddx_1-ddx_0}{T}}{T^2} \\\end{cases}⎩⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎨⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎧​a0​=x0​a1​=dx0​a2​=2ddx0​​a3​=0.5∗(20T3x1​−0.5ddx0​T2−dx0​T−x0​​−8T2dx1​−ddx0​T−dx0​​+Tddx1​−ddx0​​)a4​=T−15T3x1​−0.5ddx0​T2−dx0​T−x0​​+7T2dx1​−ddx0​T−dx0​​−Tddx1​−ddx0​​​a5​=T26T3x1​−0.5ddx0​T2−dx0​T−x0​​−3T2dx1​−ddx0​T−dx0​​+0.5Tddx1​−ddx0​​​​

入参初始条件

s(0)=a0=x0  ⟺  a0=x0s′(0)=a1=dx0  ⟺  a1=dx0s′′(0)=2a2=ddx0  ⟺  a2=ddx02\begin{aligned}s(0) = a_0 = x_0 \iff a_0 = x_0 \\ s'(0) = a_1 = dx_0 \iff a_1 = dx_0 \\s''(0) = 2a_2 = ddx_0 \iff a_2 = \frac{ddx_0}{2} \\\end{aligned}s(0)=a0​=x0​⟺a0​=x0​s′(0)=a1​=dx0​⟺a1​=dx0​s′′(0)=2a2​=ddx0​⟺a2​=2ddx0​​​

s(T)=a0+a1T+a2T2+a3T3+a4T4+a5T5=x1(8)s(T) = a_0 + a_1T + a_2T^2 + a_3T^3 + a_4T^4 + a_5T^5 = x_1\tag 8s(T)=a0​+a1​T+a2​T2+a3​T3+a4​T4+a5​T5=x1​(8)

s′(T)=a1+2a2T+3a3T2+4a4T3+5a5T4=dx1(9)s'(T) = a_1 + 2a_2T + 3a_3T^2 + 4a_4T^3 + 5a_5T^4 = dx_1 \tag 9s′(T)=a1​+2a2​T+3a3​T2+4a4​T3+5a5​T4=dx1​(9)

s′′(T)=2a2+6a3T+12a4T2+20a5T3=ddx1(10)s''(T) = 2a_2 + 6a_3T + 12a_4T^2 + 20a_5T^3 = ddx_1 \tag{10}s′′(T)=2a2​+6a3​T+12a4​T2+20a5​T3=ddx1​(10)

公式20*(8)-5*T*(9)+T*T*(10)得：

20a0+20a1T+20a2T2+20a3T3+20a4T4+20a5T5=20x18a1T+16a2T2+24a3T3+32a4T4+40a5T5=8dx1T2a2T2+6a3T3+12a4T4+20a5T5=ddx1T2  ⟺  20a0+12a1T+6a2T2+2a3T3=20x1−8dx1T+ddx1T2  ⟺  a3=20x1−8dx1T+ddx1T2−20a0−12a1T−6a2T22T3  ⟺  a3=20x1−8dx1T+ddx1T2−20x0−12dx0T−3ddx0T22T3  ⟺  a3=0.5∗(20x1−0.5ddx0T2−dx0T−x0T3−8dx1−ddx0T−dx0T2+ddx1−ddx0T)\begin{aligned}20a_0 + 20a_1T + 20a_2T^2 + 20a_3T^3 + 20a_4T^4 + 20a_5T^5 & = 20x_1 \\8a_1T + 16a_2T^2 + 24a_3T^3 + 32a_4T^4 + 40a_5T^5 & = 8dx_1T \\2a_2T^2 + 6a_3T^3 + 12a_4T^4 + 20a_5T^5& = ddx_1T^2 \\\iff 20a_0 + 12a_1T + 6a_2T^2 + 2a_3T^3& = 20x_1 - 8dx_1T + ddx_1T^2 \\\iff a_3 & = \frac{20x_1 - 8dx_1T + ddx_1T^2 - 20a_0 - 12a_1T - 6a_2T^2}{2T^3} \\\iff a_3 & = \frac{20x_1 - 8dx_1T + ddx_1T^2 - 20x_0 - 12dx_0T - 3ddx_0T^2}{2T^3} \\\iff a_3 & = 0.5*(20\frac{x_1-0.5ddx_0T^2-dx_0T-x_0}{T^3} -8\frac{dx_1-ddx_0T-dx_0}{T^2} + \frac{ddx_1-ddx_0}{T}) \\\end{aligned}20a0​+20a1​T+20a2​T2+20a3​T3+20a4​T4+20a5​T58a1​T+16a2​T2+24a3​T3+32a4​T4+40a5​T52a2​T2+6a3​T3+12a4​T4+20a5​T5⟺20a0​+12a1​T+6a2​T2+2a3​T3⟺a3​⟺a3​⟺a3​​=20x1​=8dx1​T=ddx1​T2=20x1​−8dx1​T+ddx1​T2=2T320x1​−8dx1​T+ddx1​T2−20a0​−12a1​T−6a2​T2​=2T320x1​−8dx1​T+ddx1​T2−20x0​−12dx0​T−3ddx0​T2​=0.5∗(20T3x1​−0.5ddx0​T2−dx0​T−x0​​−8T2dx1​−ddx0​T−dx0​​+Tddx1​−ddx0​​)​

提示：逆推一下得证。

公式15*(8)-7*T*(9)+T*T*(10)得：

15a0+15a1T+15a2T2+15a3T3+15a4T4+15a5T5=15x17a1T+14a2T2+21a3T3+28a4T4+35a5T5=7dx1T2a2T2+6a3T3+12a4T4+20a5T5=ddx1T2  ⟺  15a0+8a1T+3a2T2−a4T4=15x1−7dx1T+ddx1T2  ⟺  a4=15a0+8a1T+3a2T2−15x1+7dx1T−ddx1T2T4  ⟺  a4=15x0+8dx0T+3ddx02T2−15x1+7dx1T−ddx1T2T4  ⟺  a4=−15x1−0.5ddx0T2−dx0T−x0T3+7dx1−ddx0T−dx0T2−ddx1−ddx0TT\begin{aligned}15a_0 + 15a_1T + 15a_2T^2 + 15a_3T^3 + 15a_4T^4 + 15a_5T^5 & = 15x_1 \\7a_1T + 14a_2T^2 + 21a_3T^3 + 28a_4T^4 + 35a_5T^5 & = 7dx_1T \\2a_2T^2 + 6a_3T^3 + 12a_4T^4 + 20a_5T^5& = ddx_1T^2 \\\iff 15a_0 + 8a_1T + 3a_2T^2 - a_4T^4& = 15x_1 - 7dx_1T + ddx_1T^2 \\\iff a_4 & = \frac{15a_0 + 8a_1T + 3a_2T^2 - 15x_1 + 7dx_1T - ddx_1T^2}{T^4} \\\iff a_4 & = \frac{15x_0 + 8dx_0T + 3\frac{ddx_0}{2}T^2 - 15x_1 + 7dx_1T - ddx_1T^2}{T^4} \\\iff a_4 & =\frac{-15\frac{x_1-0.5ddx_0T^2-dx_0T-x_0}{T^3} + 7\frac{dx_1-ddx_0T-dx_0}{T^2} - \frac{ddx_1-ddx_0}{T}}{T} \\\end{aligned}15a0​+15a1​T+15a2​T2+15a3​T3+15a4​T4+15a5​T57a1​T+14a2​T2+21a3​T3+28a4​T4+35a5​T52a2​T2+6a3​T3+12a4​T4+20a5​T5⟺15a0​+8a1​T+3a2​T2−a4​T4⟺a4​⟺a4​⟺a4​​=15x1​=7dx1​T=ddx1​T2=15x1​−7dx1​T+ddx1​T2=T415a0​+8a1​T+3a2​T2−15x1​+7dx1​T−ddx1​T2​=T415x0​+8dx0​T+32ddx0​​T2−15x1​+7dx1​T−ddx1​T2​=T−15T3x1​−0.5ddx0​T2−dx0​T−x0​​+7T2dx1​−ddx0​T−dx0​​−Tddx1​−ddx0​​​​

提示：逆推一下得证。

公式12*(8)-6*T*(9)+T*T*(10)得：

12a0+12a1T+12a2T2+12a3T3+12a4T4+12a5T5=12x16a1T+12a2T2+18a3T3+24a4T4+30a5T5=6dx1T2a2T2+6a3T3+12a4T4+20a5T5=ddx1T2  ⟺  12a0+6a1T+2a2T2+2a5T5=12x1−6dx1T+ddx1T2  ⟺  a5=12x1−6dx1T+ddx1T2−12a0−6a1T−2a2T22T5  ⟺  a5=12x1−6dx1T+ddx1T2−12x0−6dx0T−ddx0T22T5  ⟺  a5=6x1−0.5ddx0T2−dx0T−x0T3−3dx1−ddx0T−dx0T2+0.5ddx1−ddx0TT2\begin{aligned}12a_0 + 12a_1T + 12a_2T^2 + 12a_3T^3 + 12a_4T^4 + 12a_5T^5 & = 12x_1 \\6a_1T + 12a_2T^2 + 18a_3T^3 + 24a_4T^4 + 30a_5T^5 & = 6dx_1T \\2a_2T^2 + 6a_3T^3 + 12a_4T^4 + 20a_5T^5& = ddx_1T^2 \\\iff 12a_0 + 6a_1T + 2a_2T^2 + 2a_5T^5& = 12x_1 - 6dx_1T + ddx_1T^2 \\\iff a_5 & = \frac{12x_1 - 6dx_1T + ddx_1T^2 - 12a_0 - 6a_1T - 2a_2T^2}{2T^5} \\\iff a_5 & = \frac{12x_1 - 6dx_1T + ddx_1T^2 - 12x_0 - 6dx_0T - ddx_0T^2}{2T^5} \\\iff a_5 & =\frac{6\frac{x_1-0.5ddx_0T^2-dx_0T-x_0}{T^3} - 3\frac{dx_1-ddx_0T-dx_0}{T^2} + 0.5\frac{ddx_1-ddx_0}{T}}{T^2} \\\end{aligned}12a0​+12a1​T+12a2​T2+12a3​T3+12a4​T4+12a5​T56a1​T+12a2​T2+18a3​T3+24a4​T4+30a5​T52a2​T2+6a3​T3+12a4​T4+20a5​T5⟺12a0​+6a1​T+2a2​T2+2a5​T5⟺a5​⟺a5​⟺a5​​=12x1​=6dx1​T=ddx1​T2=12x1​−6dx1​T+ddx1​T2=2T512x1​−6dx1​T+ddx1​T2−12a0​−6a1​T−2a2​T2​=2T512x1​−6dx1​T+ddx1​T2−12x0​−6dx0​T−ddx0​T2​=T26T3x1​−0.5ddx0​T2−dx0​T−x0​​−3T2dx1​−ddx0​T−dx0​​+0.5Tddx1​−ddx0​​​​

提示：逆推一下得证。

<font color=green>CubicPolynomialCurve1d::Evaluate()</font>是计算几阶导数的值。
entry.summary:
多项次曲线

Apollo r5.5.0代码分析。
